## Minify.js property

Whether enable the JavaScript minification.

**Signature:**

```typescript
js?: boolean | undefined;
```

## Example

- Disable the JavaScript minification.

```js
import { defineConfig } from '@lynx-js/rspeedy';

export default defineConfig({
  output: {
    minify: {
      js: false,
    },
  },
});
```
